alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 02 at 1:54PM EST until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tallahassee FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd affecting Leon and Wakulla Counties. For the St. Marks River...including Newport On Old Magnolia Rd... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Several structures on Old Magnolia Road are surrounded by water up to 1 foot deep in Wakulla County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 8.9 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.9 feet on 02/01/1991. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 800 AM EST.
